alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:34PM MDT until May 09 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WELD AND SOUTHEASTERN BOULDER COUNTIES... At 1034 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Longmont, or 28 miles southwest of Greeley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Frederick around 1045 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Berthoud and Mead. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
